content.0: Focallocal is an open, welcoming community of thousands of positive people around the world.
content.1: Since 2012 we have been coming together and targeting the root causes of any, and all societal issues.
content.2: Sharing ideas, and using fun activities to empower people to build a friendlier, happier more connected future for everyone.
content.3: Join us and turn Public Happiness into a daily habit to explore your power to change the world, and the happiness it'll bring into your life

items.smiley: make the world happier every day
items.friends: make + meet positive friends all over the world
items.share: share + learn skills for your career or building change

content.0: You'll be a part of a growing global Movement with a plan to change the world
content.1: Meeting positive, pro-active, awesome new friends both locally, and globally
content.2: Together using simple, fun activities and exploring new ideas to shape friendlier, happier communities
content.3: Bringing peace and well-being to everyone, everywhere

2.title: What is our mission and message?

content.0: Oh and fun! ..making change should also be fun and easy. That way as many people as possible want to join in!
content.2: The time for waiting for others to fix this planet is over. Modern technology allows us to coordinate action and share great ideas for change in a way never before possible
content.3: While each action may feel like a tiny ripple. As more and more people join in the effects multiply, combining to form an unstoppable wave, a Positive Action Movement which can sweep across this planet
content.4: Our message is that YOU have the power to change the world around you, and our mission is to give you the tools to create that positive change

subs.0: 'Choose a category' and create your listing
subs.1: Find the best 'suggestions' from around the world
subs.2: 'Something new' suggest your own idea (mods will approve it asap)
